description:
Beautiful Upper West Side apartment on third floor of prewar walk-up building set against a very quiet and tranquil courtyard. Light-filled with high ceilings and eclectic furnishings. Queen in bedroom and fold out sofa with enclosed blow up mattress in living room. 

One of the best locations in New York. Nearly unlimited restaurants and coffee shops. Less than 5 minute walk to two different subway lines (A/C and 1/2/3). Within blocks of Central Park, Riverside Park, and Columbia University.
name: Beautiful, light filled apartment by Central Park
review: It was the best stay at Airbnb we had so far. Charles was super kind and provided all we need to make this trip incredible. Apartment located close to Central Park and subway. There are many places to go. Apartment is clean and cozy. I definitely recommend you to visit Charle's apartment if you want to make your trip to New York amazing.
